summary: fixes and improves some of the perks that are considered weak or useless while still maintaining vanilla flavour
descriptionHtml:
[list][*][size=3]Fists of Steel now adds double the base armor of the gauntlets to your unarmed damage[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Reflect blows works every time and reflects 10% of melee damage that comes in while reducing your incoming damage by 10%.[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Tower of Steel completely eliminates incoming stagger when fully equipped in heavy armor.[/size]
[/*][/list]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3381541/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Check out my other mods![/url]
author: mrjentipede
